title: Gold ADC main looking for team
body:
I follow the pro scene and I am interested in what 5 man league is like and how it is different to solo q. Ideally looking for a team with people experienced playing in open ladder and organizing scrims. 

My discord is hamez#8827 and my lol account is [parakeetay](https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=parakeetay)

thanks!

replies.body:
Hi there Parakeetay, 

I represent a large discord based community, I saw your post and I think we have what you're looking for. We currently have structured ranked teams running and we're always on the lookout to expand. We can offer coaching as well. Discord link is below, join anytime. 

https://discord.gg/DwUMNDQ
